# ü§ç Press `donate` to pay respects

If you'd like to support me or my non-commercial projects and educational efforts ‚Äî you can do that here. Your donations **really motivate** me to continue working on awesome stuff, add new features, remove bugs, and help people be awesome ü§ò

If you've donated, contact me on [X/Twitter](https://twitter.com/novusnota), [Telegram](https://t.me/novusnotabot) or Discord @novusnota ‚Äî I'd like to personally thank you. Additionally, if you feel like it, I can add your name, link to your personal profile, a message or the name of the project you're donating for to the list of [supporters below](#paid-respects-).

You may:
